description: When using --notification_driver=nova.notifier.rabbit_notifier, if the error contains any non-JSON serializable objects (like an object instance), the queue call will fail.
title: Compute error reporting to Notification system fails on non-JSON serializable objects

comments.content: When using --notification_driver=nova.notifier.rabbit_notifier, if the error contains any non-JSON serializable objects (like an object instance), the queue call will fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sandy-walsh
